page.title: 06Family Businesses,Hemsworth
page.content: Mr.Vicars owns a corner shop. He has been living in Hemsworth for 48 years, although he has only worked in Hemsworth for 2 years. There have been quite a lot of changes sinse Mr.Vicars has been living here as a lot of new estates have been built, such as the Scotch Estate and Lowfield Road which used to be Crow Lane. Mr. Tolson,the cobbler, started shoe repairing 65 years ago. He has always lived in Hemsworth. On Cross Hills there used to be a school and where G T News is now there used to be a water trough. Mr Tolson agrees with Mr. Vicars that there ought to be a Community Centre for elderly people. He also thinks that people should set up their own businesses.
